title: CREATE IN ME A NEW HEART O LORD
bible_ref: A new heart also will I give you, and a new spirit will I put within you. Eze. 36:26
verses: Create in me a new heart O God=And renew a right Spirit within me=Create in me a new heart O God=And renew a right Spirit within me
chorus: Cast me not a way from Your Presence O Lord=Take not Your Holy Spirit from me=Restore unto me, the Joy of your salvation=And renew a right Spirit within me.
